name: It takes two (itch) (fridays1881)
description:
You found an old game with your friend, I wonder whats the worst that could happen?

Your goal is to get through as many levels as possible, you do this by getting both players on the green tile, the rest of the game is explained at the start!

My 1st submission for the Love2D 2023 Game jam(Link here)

(Press escape to leave the game)
